SEARCH
Package additional

Class News

java.lang.Object
additional.News
public class News extends Object
The News class represents a news article with a title, content, publication date, topic, and associated comments.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    News(String title, String content, Date datePublished, String topic, boolean isPinned)
    Constructs a News object with the specified title, content, publication date, topic, and pin status.

  • Constructor Details

    • News

      public News(String title, String content, Date datePublished, String topic, boolean isPinned)
      Constructs a News object with the specified title, content, publication date, topic, and pin status.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the news article.
      content - The content of the news article.
      datePublished - The date when the news article was published.
      topic - The topic or category of the news article.
      isPinned - True if the news article is pinned; otherwise, false.
